actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Internal Security.

official_title: A bill to insure the separation of Federal powers and to protect the legislative function by abolishing the Subversive Activities Control Board.
short_title: Subversive Activities Control Board Termination Act

summary.text: Subversive Activities Control Board Terminatin Act - Provides that the Subversive Activities Control Board shall cease to exist, and that all proceedings before such Board shall abate, on the date of enactment of this Act. (Amends 50 U.S.C. 791(i))

titles.title: Subversive Activities Control Board Termination Act
A bill to insure the separation of Federal powers and to protect the legislative function by abolishing the Subversive Activities Control Board.
